titles.title: Supporting the Weed and Seed and COPS programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E246)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
1/30/2007--Introduced.
Encourages the establishment of more Weed and Seed program sites and urges full funding of requests by a community for help from the Weed and Seed and Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) programs.
